description: A low, upholstered platform bed with a tall padded headboard in warm ivory fabric, dressed in layered white bedding and a sand-colored throw.

core:description.text: A king-size, low-profile platform bed centered on the wall. The headboard is tall and fully upholstered in a warm ivory linen-blend; the base is likewise upholstered with a flush plinth and no visible legs. Bedding is crisp white with multiple pillows and a soft beige throw, conveying a calm, luxurious look.

core:portrait.altText: King-size upholstered platform bed with tall ivory headboard, layered white bedding, and beige throw.
